label.h3: Which of the following statements about Batch Validation Rule Analysis is true?

checkboxgroup.choice: Batch Validation Rule Analysis allows you to validate data across multiple data sets and periods for one or multiple organisation units
To run the analysis, a Validation Rule Group must be selected
In the list of results, you can see which user broke the validation rule and notify them
In the list of results, you can find information on the value, operator and validation rule

div.p: Batch Validation Rule Analysis allows you to validate data across multiple data sets and periods for one or multiple organisation units. In order to run the analysis, a Validation Rule Group must be selected. In the list of results, you can find information on the value, operator and validation rule. You cannot find which user broke the validation rule and notify them.
